item.description: We always have a fantastic time at our holiday parties!  Dress to impress, optional $10 grab bag gift, and BYOB. Bring either an appetizer or dessert to share.  Dues paying Members $5, Guests $10.  To reserve, call Gail at 860-582-8229.  Directions to 35 Anthony Drive:  I‑84 Exit 33 (Rt. 72W), then Exit 1 (Rt. 177), right onto North Washington St., at 2nd light left onto Northwest Dr., at end right onto Camp St., left onto O'Sullivan Dr., at end turn right to stop, left onto Brace Ave., left onto Anthony Drive.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be inside waiting for you.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Holiday House Party
